name: Bitoreum
description: Bitoreum is a decentralized financial technology accessible to everyone that is fast, reliable and secure with negligible transaction costs. Bitoreum has its own blockchain, which is a fork of Raptoreum codebase with ASIC resistant POW algorithm and consensus ensuring Smartnodes which make the network immune to 51% attacks. Bitoreum coins can be mined on both CPU and GPU. Bitoreum cares about privacy and has an integrated CoinJoin mechanism that allows to hide the balance directly in the wallet.
